Title: Outlook: Import calendars and contacts from PST file to mailbox in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to import calendars and contacts from .pst file to mailbox. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: October CY2025
